summary: It's a documentary about a group of old ladies that have been friends since high school and they decided to see each other every month. The film documents their interactions and conversations.
cast: María Teresa Muñoz|Alicia Pérez|Angélica Charpentier|Ximena Calderón|Juanita Vásquez|Nina Chiccarelli|Manuela Rodríguez|Inés Krisch|Gema Droguett
title: La Once
